Posts.Content: I am looking at having a prophylactic mastectomy and reconstruction w/the DIEP flap procedure. I am looking at Beth Israel in Boston (Dr. Lee) and Johns Hopkins.Has anyone been to either hospital for this procedure and what is your opinion? What was your experience like? (surgery, recovery, etc) Anything that you can shear would be a great help to me. Thank you.
Posts.Title: DIEP- Boston or Johns Hopkins
